Tasks_RC:Click on Task button in commandbar

Tasks_RC:Click on Mark Complete button in commandbar

Tasks_RC:Verfies the Task Outcome option and select one option
Tasks_RC:Verfies the Task completion Comment Textbox and fills some text
Tasks_RC:Select Task Follow up Date from Calender
Tasks_RC:Click on Mark Complete button in commandbar
